mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HNYC_CORP_INFO (corp_code, corp_full_name, corp_name, corp_type, corp_property, corp_regionalism, corp_area, postalcode, address, tel, fa, email, http, super_corp_code, province, invoice_label, tarate, ta_number, accounts, status) VALUES ( #{corp_code, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{corp_full_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{corp_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{corp_type, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{corp_property, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{corp_regionalism, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{corp_area, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postalcode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fa, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{http, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{super_corp_code, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{invoice_label, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tarate, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ta_number, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accounts, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: UPDATE HNYC_CORP_INFO SET corp_full_name = #{corp_full_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, corp_name = #{corp_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, corp_type = #{corp_type, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, corp_property = #{corp_property, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, corp_regionalism = #{corp_regionalism, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, corp_area = #{corp_area, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, postalcode = #{postalcode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tel = #{tel, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fa = #{fa, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, http = #{http, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, super_corp_code = #{super_corp_code, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province = #{province, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, invoice_label = #{invoice_label, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tarate = #{tarate, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ta_number = #{ta_number, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, accounts = #{accounts, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status, jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE corp_code = #{corp_code, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
